Text: HPL History Last entry Cc Morning As youre aware we will be producing a souvenir booklet on HPL for the anniversary party and I want to include another entry under that indicates the start of a new era since HPL has a data room open I would appreciate your thoughts on how to word that Thanks Elaine HPL Historydoc
